gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.service.workflow
Interface WorkflowService

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorkflowServiceImpl
@Transactional(readOnly=false)
public interface WorkflowService

This interface consists of service methods that facilitates Routing & Review use-case. There are method for creating ProcessInstances, creating TaskInstances, fetching them and closing taskInstances.

Author:
Sameer Sawant, Biju Joseph
